picked_headlines.summary: ML accelerates automotive crash modeling, reducing costs and enhancing design.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a practical application of machine learning in the automotive industry, showcasing significant cost reductions and efficiency improvements. It appeals to both engineers and stakeholders interested in product innovation and cost management.

picked_headlines.summary: Shakti-VLMs excel in multimodal tasks with fewer data, boosting enterprise AI.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: Shakti-VLMs represent a significant advancement in vision-language models, enhancing efficiency in enterprise AI applications. This appeals to both technical audiences and management by highlighting innovation in AI model development and deployment.

digest:
- *Tequila* improves ternary quantization for LLMs, enhancing edge deployment efficiency. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.23809
- *FPEdit* offers robust LLM fingerprinting, ensuring model integrity with minimal resources. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.02092
- *GradES* accelerates transformer training with gradient-based early stopping, boosting efficiency in language and vision tasks. Details here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.01842
- *AppCopilot* provides a framework for efficient mobile agents, addressing generalization and resource use challenges. Explore: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.02444
- *InfiR2* enhances LLM efficiency with an open-source FP8 training recipe, achieving performance gains. More info: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.22536
- *VerlTool* unifies multi-turn reinforcement learning with tools, improving efficiency across domains. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.01055
- *Cost-Aware Retrieval-Augmentation* reduces costs in question answering tasks with adaptive retrieval depth. Read further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.15719
- *RadarLLM* fine-tunes LLMs for marine radar detection, improving performance in low SCR scenarios. Discover more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12089
- *Scaling Beyond Context* surveys challenges in multimodal retrieval-augmented generation for document understanding. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.15253
- *Exploring the Synergy of Quantitative Factors* enhances stock return prediction by combining quantitative factors and newsflow. Details here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.15691
